import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Link } from '../../interfaces/link'; @Component({ selector: 'appHeader', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { links: Array; authLinks: Array; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { this.links = [ { label: 'Acceuil', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt', visible: true, }, { label: 'Mes Cv', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt', visible: true, }, ] this.authLinks = [ { label: 'S\'inscrire', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt', visible: true, }, { label: 'Se connecter', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt', visible: true, }, { label: 'Se déconnecter', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt', visible: true, }, ] } }
